Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides discounted central business district tolls to individuals residing in transit deserts
Summary: Provides a fifty percent discount on all central business district tolls, fees and other charges to individuals residing in transit deserts; requires proof of residency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing discounted central business district tolls to individuals residing in transit deserts
